objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Basilisk near Reptilia Pools.
objectives.name: A report has been received about a basilisk rampaging in the bog.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Valravn Knight at the end of Escort Ardent Gale as she poisons valravn nests, southeast of Valravn's Perch.
objectives.name: There are reports of a valravn knight hiding near the upper waterfalls.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Valravn south of Maul Boneyards.
objectives.name: A valravn is lurking near the graveyard and needs to be dealt with before it eats someone's heart.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Reef Shark in "Kill the reef shark in the delta bog" event.
objectives.name: A large shark has been spotted off the coast and is interfering with the balance of sea life.

objectives.hint: Defeat the Champion Drake Matriarch after "Catch and collect the flying fish" event.
objectives.name: Drakes have been attracted to the local catch in the fishing village, and the kodan need a hand driving them away.
